physicalObject

类 Friend

    public class Friend
extends java.lang.Object
implements PhysicalObject

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Friend

        public Friend(java.lang.String name,
              int age,
              char sex)
        Constructor.
        参数:
        name - Name of this friend. This must be consist of only letters or numbers and mustn't contain any blank space or any other characters.
        age - Age of this friend. This must be a positive integer.
        sex - Sex of this friend. This must be either 'M' or 'F'. 'M' representing male and 'F' representing female.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        从接口复制的说明: PhysicalObject
        Observer. Get name of the physical object. This method should only perform in social network circle and stellar system.
        指定者:
        getName 在接口中 PhysicalObject
        返回:
        name of the physical object

      • getDegree

        public double getDegree()
        从接口复制的说明: PhysicalObject
        Observer. Get degree of the physical object.
        指定者:
        getDegree 在接口中 PhysicalObject
        返回:
        degree of the physical object

      • getDirect

        public boolean getDirect()
        This method is non-existent in atom structure.
        指定者:
        getDirect 在接口中 PhysicalObject
        返回:
        direct of the physical object, true if the direct is clockwise, false if the direct is counter-clockwise.

      • getSpeed

        public double getSpeed()
        This method is non-existent in atom structure.
        指定者:
        getSpeed 在接口中 PhysicalObject
        返回:
        speed of the physical object. The unit is kilogram per second.

      • getRaidus

        public double getRaidus()
        This method is non-existent in atom structure.
        指定者:
        getRaidus 在接口中 PhysicalObject
        返回:
        radius of the physical object. The unit is kilometer.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object friend)
        Two friends are equal only when they have the same name.
        覆盖:
        equals 在类中 java.lang.Object

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Equality of friends only links with name, so hash code of friends can be name's hash code.
        覆盖:
        hashCode 在类中 java.lang.Object
